name: Aerobatic Ant
description:
Ant is one hell of a stunt pilot. Unfortunately for you, he's decided to practice his stunts directly over your farm. Grab a few friends and use your flippers to keep him away from your chickens! If Ant scares all your chickens off your barn, it's curtains for you!

This game was made in the space of about a week and a half, in honour of a friend's birthday. I am probably finished with it but may go back and add support for touch devices if there's demand for it. If you have any feedback or suggestions, you can find me on twitter at @synth_ruiner!

Default controls

Flippers: Left Ctrl, Space, Right Ctrl, Numpad Enter

P to pause, R to reset, Esc to quit
